snippet: The Bernie Madoff saga will come to HBO now that the network has acquired the rights to the book “The Wizard of Lies.”
lead_paragraph: 6:21 p.m. | Updated The Bernard Madoff saga will come to HBO as an original movie now that the network has acquired the rights to the book “The Wizard of Lies,” written by Diana Henriques, a reporter for The New York Times.

headline.main: HBO Talking to DeNiro for Movie About Madoff
